message: Aw yeah! Pumpkin for teh win http://ualoo.com/images/pumpkinpie.jpg

The question is to ask: what is your favorite kind of pie?  Mine was chocolate silk pie until @mistahsnart and I went to the Duluth area last summer and ate the most delicious coconut cream pie. Now all I can think about is that pie. Mmm. Pie. Too bad it's 4 hours away... *sad face*  What about you?
I'm a huge fan or raw blueberry pie http://blogs.kcrw.com/goodfood/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/raw_blueberry_1.JPG
Apple pie.  The kind with the strips of crust criss-crossed on the top.
I'd rather just freeze cool whip and eat it out of the container like it was ice cream.
My answer: Yes. Provided there's Cool Whip closeby.
although key lime is a close second
@cym0n OMG bacon...Where's the king of all things porcine, Nick Dawson?
@herbg I think he's been focusing on some studies lately. We can talk all kinds of nasty about him while he's away :P
